---
title: "In-class Exercise 7"
author: "Brigitta Karen Tsai"
date: "October 14, 2024"
date-modified: "last-modified"
execute: 
  eval: true
  echo: true
  message: false
  freeze: true
---


## 1 Load and Install R Packages


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
pacman::p_load(olsrr, corrplot, ggpubr,
               sf, spdep, GWmodel, tmap,
               tidyverse, gtsummary, ggstatsplot,
               sfdep)
```
:::


## 2 Importing Data


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
condo_resale <- read_csv("data/aspatial/Condo_resale_2015.csv")
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}

```
Rows: 1436 Columns: 23
── Column specification ────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
Delimiter: ","
dbl (23): LATITUDE, LONGITUDE, POSTCODE, SELLING_PRICE, AREA_SQM, AGE, PROX_...

ℹ Use `spec()` to retrieve the full column specification for this data.
ℹ Specify the column types or set `show_col_types = FALSE` to quiet this message.
```


:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
condo_resale.sf <- st_as_sf(condo_resale,
                            coords = c("LONGITUDE", "LATITUDE"),
                            crs=4326) %>%
  st_transform(crs=3414)
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
mpsz = st_read(dsn = "data/geospatial", layer = "MP14_SUBZONE_WEB_PL")
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
Reading layer `MP14_SUBZONE_WEB_PL' from data source 
  `C:\brigittatsai\ISSS626_AY2024-25_T1\In-class_Ex\In-class_Ex07\data\geospatial' 
  using driver `ESRI Shapefile'
Simple feature collection with 323 features and 15 fields
Geometry type: MULTIPOLYGON
Dimension:     XY
Bounding box:  xmin: 2667.538 ymin: 15748.72 xmax: 56396.44 ymax: 50256.33
Projected CRS: SVY21
```


:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
mpsz_svy21 <- st_transform(mpsz, 3414)
```
:::


## 3 Correlation Analysis


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ggcorrmat(condo_resale[, 5:23])
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](In-class_Ex07_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-6-1.png){width=1152}
:::
:::


## 4 Linear Regression Method


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
condo_mlr <- lm(formula = SELLING_PRICE ~ AREA_SQM +
                  AGE + PROX_CBD + PROX_CHILDCARE +
                  PROX_ELDERLYCARE + PROX_URA_GROWTH_AREA +
                  PROX_HAWKER_MARKET + PROX_KINDERGARTEN +
                  PROX_MRT + PROX_PARK + PROX_PRIMARY_SCH +
                  PROX_TOP_PRIMARY_SCH + PROX_SHOPPING_MALL +
                  PROX_SUPERMARKET + PROX_BUS_STOP +
                  NO_Of_UNITS + FAMILY_FRIENDLY +
                  FREEHOLD + LEASEHOLD_99YR,
                data=condo_resale.sf)
summary(condo_mlr)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```

    PROX_KINDERGARTEN + PROX_MRT + PROX_PARK + PROX_PRIMARY_SCH + 
    PROX_TOP_PRIMARY_SCH + PROX_SHOPPING_MALL + PROX_SUPERMARKET +
```

```{.r .cell-code}
ols_regress(condo_mlr)
```

:::
:::


### 5.1 Multicolinearity


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ols_vif_tol(condo_mlr)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
              Variables Tolerance      VIF
1              AREA_SQM 0.8601326 1.162611
2                   AGE 0.7011585 1.426211
3              PROX_CBD 0.4575471 2.185567
4        PROX_CHILDCARE 0.2898233 3.450378
5      PROX_ELDERLYCARE 0.5922238 1.688551
6  PROX_URA_GROWTH_AREA 0.6614081 1.511926
7    PROX_HAWKER_MARKET 0.4373874 2.286303
8     PROX_KINDERGARTEN 0.8356793 1.196631
9              PROX_MRT 0.4949877 2.020252
10            PROX_PARK 0.8015728 1.247547
11     PROX_PRIMARY_SCH 0.3823248 2.615577
12 PROX_TOP_PRIMARY_SCH 0.4878620 2.049760
13   PROX_SHOPPING_MALL 0.4903052 2.039546
14     PROX_SUPERMARKET 0.6142127 1.628100
15        PROX_BUS_STOP 0.3311024 3.020213
16          NO_Of_UNITS 0.6543336 1.528272
17      FAMILY_FRIENDLY 0.7191719 1.390488
18             FREEHOLD 0.2728521 3.664990
19       LEASEHOLD_99YR 0.2645988 3.779307
```


:::
:::


### 5.2 Variable Selection


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
condo_fw_mlr <- ols_step_forward_p(
  condo_mlr,
  p_val = 0.05,
  details = FALSE # TRUE = multiple iterations
)
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
plot(condo_fw_mlr)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](In-class_Ex07_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-11-1.png){width=1152}
:::
:::


### 5.3 Test for Non-Linearity


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ols_plot_resid_fit(condo_fw_mlr$model) # no need to choose variable manually 
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](In-class_Ex07_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-12-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ols_plot_resid_hist(condo_fw_mlr$model)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](In-class_Ex07_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-13-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ols_test_normality(condo_fw_mlr$model)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}

```
Warning in ks.test.default(y, "pnorm", mean(y), sd(y)): ties should not be
present for the one-sample Kolmogorov-Smirnov test
```


:::

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
-----------------------------------------------
       Test             Statistic       pvalue  
-----------------------------------------------
Shapiro-Wilk              0.6856         0.0000 
Kolmogorov-Smirnov        0.1366         0.0000 
Cramer-von Mises         121.0768        0.0000 
Anderson-Darling         67.9551         0.0000 
-----------------------------------------------
```


:::
:::


### 5.4 Testing for Spatial Autocorrelation


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
mlr_output <- as.data.frame(condo_fw_mlr$model$residuals) %>% 
  rename('FW_MLR_RES' = 'condo_fw_mlr$model$residuals')
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
condo_resale_sf <- cbind(condo_resale.sf,
                         mlr_output$FW_MLR_RES) %>% 
  rename('MLR_RES' = 'mlr_output.FW_MLR_RES')
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
tmap_mode("plot")
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}

```
tmap mode set to plotting
```


:::

```{.r .cell-code}
tm_shape(mpsz) + 
  tmap_options(check.and.fix = TRUE) + # to fix geometric problems
  tm_polygons(alpha = 0.4) +
  tm_shape(condo_resale_sf) + 
    tm_dots(col = "MLR_RES",
            alpha = 0.6,
            style = "quantile")
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}

```
Warning: The shape mpsz is invalid. See sf::st_is_valid
```


:::

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}

```
Variable(s) "MLR_RES" contains positive and negative values, so midpoint is set to 0. Set midpoint = NA to show the full spectrum of the color palette.
```


:::

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](In-class_Ex07_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-17-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
condo_resale_sf <- condo_resale_sf %>% 
  mutate(nb = st_knn(geometry, k = 6,
                     longlat = FALSE),
         wt = st_weights(nb,
                         style = "W"),
         .before = 1)
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
global_moran_perm(condo_resale_sf$MLR_RES,
                  condo_resale_sf$nb,
                  condo_resale_sf$wt,
                  alternative = "two.sided",
                  nsim = 99)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```

	Monte-Carlo simulation of Moran I

data:  x 
weights: listw  
number of simulations + 1: 100 

statistic = 0.32254, observed rank = 100, p-value < 2.2e-16
alternative hypothesis: two.sided
```


:::
:::


The global Moran's I test for residual spatial autocorrelation shows that the p-value is less than 0.00000000000000022 , which is less then the alpha of 0.05. Hence, we will reject the null hypothesis that the residuals are randomly distributed (if it's rejected, it's not random)

### 5.5 Fixed Bandwidth


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
bw_fixed <- bw.gwr(formula = SELLING_PRICE ~ AREA_SQM + AGE +
                     PROX_CBD + PROX_CHILDCARE +
                     PROX_ELDERLYCARE + PROX_URA_GROWTH_AREA +
                     PROX_MRT + PROX_PARK + PROX_PRIMARY_SCH +
                     PROX_SHOPPING_MALL + PROX_BUS_STOP +
                      NO_Of_UNITS + FAMILY_FRIENDLY + FREEHOLD,
                   data = condo_resale_sf,
                   approach = "CV",
                   kernel = "gaussian", # must be consistent 
                   adaptive = FALSE,
                   longlat = FALSE)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```

```


:::
:::


Now we use the code below to calibrate the gwr model using fixed bandwidth and gaussian kernel


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
gwr_fixed <- gwr.basic(formula = SELLING_PRICE ~ AREA_SQM + AGE +
                     PROX_CBD + PROX_CHILDCARE +
                     PROX_ELDERLYCARE + PROX_URA_GROWTH_AREA +
                     PROX_MRT + PROX_PARK + PROX_PRIMARY_SCH +
                     PROX_SHOPPING_MALL + PROX_BUS_STOP +
                      NO_Of_UNITS + FAMILY_FRIENDLY + FREEHOLD,
                   data = condo_resale_sf,
                   bw = bw_fixed,
                   kernel = "gaussian", # must be consistent 
                   adaptive = FALSE,
                   longlat = FALSE)
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
gwr_fixed
```

### 5.6 Converting SDF into sf dataframe


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
gwr_fixed_output <- as.data.frame(
  gwr_fixed$SDF) %>% 
  select(-c(2:15))
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
gwr_sf_fixed <- cbind(condo_resale_sf,
                      gwr_fixed_output)
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
glimpse(gwr_sf_fixed)
```
